title: Sokal Index for Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia (CML)
desc: The Sokal Index for CML predicts survival of CML based on clinical and lab information.

data.evidence: Sokal Score = exp([0.0116 × (age in years – 43.4)] + [0.0345 × (spleen size in cm – 7.51)] + [0.188 x ((platelets in 109/L / 700)2 – 0.563)] + [0.0887 × (blasts in % – 2.10)])
